duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide protection and logistical support at clients' homes and during travel.
Detect and defeat adversaries to ensure client safety and privacy.
Create and maintain readiness to meet any threat.
Survey and prepare locations prior to the arrival of the protected person.
Coordinate and execute plans for security and medical emergencies.

education_certification.credential: At least 5 years of experience at the highest level of performance and client expectation.
Military, Law Enforcement, or Private Security background.
Ability to pass pre-employment background investigation and physical readiness test.
Commitment to maintaining a high level of attentiveness and energy.
Emergency Medical Technician (EMT)/Paramedic qualification is a plus.
